lexUnit.name: unload.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: remove (goods) from a vehicle, ship, etc. NB: there is a closely related sense of unload in the Emptying frame

sentence.text: Goods can be unloaded and dealt with as soon as they arrive from the manufacturer .
Inevitably , containerized , multi-modal shipments require that the goods be unloaded from one mode of conveyance and reloaded on another .
Goods would be unloaded at Lindau , taken across the Bodensee to Rorschach , and from there go on through the passes to the south , to Milan or on to Venice for further shipment .
Everything was grey , wet and colourless as we stood by the rail watching the luggage being unloaded into the custom sheds .
When the King saw the luggage being unloaded he was horrified .
According to the teletype , ` the handwritten duty sheet indicates only that the luggage was unloaded from Air Malta 180 .
A middle-aged couple got out and began to unload a motley collection of boxes and bags .
The first serious storm of the season broke in the scudding sky above them just as John was unloading the last of the boxes from his car .
When we left Baghdad , there was no further news of what had happened to those on board , except that the ship had been forced to unload its cargo in the port of Kabbous , Oman .
Then they would unload their human cargo and speed back , using a different route , to repeat the process .
Laura unloaded her cargo on to the sofa .
The men were out there , unloading the catch on to the small boats .
Christina approached a young lad unloading crates of Cockspur golden rum on to the veranda of a tiny bar .
Three youths armed with Armalite pen-knives waited for the band to unload their gear before threatening them and attempting to drive away with their van .
Both raw materials and finished products were all in bags -- we unloaded the raw materials up until midnight then re-loaded the lorries from midnight onwards for the drivers to deliver the next day .
It took only a few minutes to reach her cottage and Maltravers completed his story while she unloaded the shopping in the kitchen .
Toulson was unloading a horse from his lorry when the animal landed on top of him .
No one spoke ; they began to unload the cases from the lorry .
There they unloaded their loot into waiting landrovers and lorries .
They unloaded their trays on to a table .
The order was still being unloaded .
A large consignment of weapons was unloaded from a Soviet ship at Assab on 21 September .
As the loose barley was unloaded on to the goafstead , a boy rode a quiet old farmhorse round and round on the corn , trampling it down .
